hidden_dimensions.name: Scent Profile
hidden_dimensions.description: Specific fragrance notes and overall scent character (e.g., fruity, sweet, clean, bright, feminine, powdery, hint of suede, champagne, raspberry). Users have very specific preferences.

hidden_dimensions.name: Longevity/Lasting Power
hidden_dimensions.description: How long the scent lasts after application. Users want a fragrance that lingers throughout the day without being overpowering.

hidden_dimensions.name: Intensity/Strength
hidden_dimensions.description: The strength of the scent. Users want to avoid overpowering fragrances, especially in work or social situations.

hidden_dimensions.name: Packaging Quality
hidden_dimensions.description: The quality and appearance of the bottle and packaging. This includes material (plastic vs. other materials) and color. Also whether product matches advertisement.

hidden_dimensions.name: Application Method Suitability
hidden_dimensions.description: How the perfume is applied (spray, oil, etc.) and how well it works with different application methods (skin vs. clothing).
